title: Story time! ( Boards minigame )
body:
Here's how it works. I'll start off the story, and then you guys have to finish it. The max reply length is one sentence, and you have to keep it simple. You can't reply to your own reply ( Have to let someone else go after you ). Try and keep the story funny, interesting, and surprising. Try to keep this under 18, just incase. Ready... set... go!



Once upon a time...

replies.body: I was alone and saturated from rain on a cold, windy night. :^)
I looked around the rainy yet surprisingly quiet streets of my hometown, realising how dark it actually was.
Seein' as I'm afraid of the dark, I shat in meh arse-rug n' started cryin' for mummeh.

> [{quoted}](name=Industrious,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mdYiEB82,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-06T13:36:24.162+0000)
>
> Seein' as I'm afraid of the dark, I shat in meh arse-rug n' started cryin' for mummeh.

Then i realised i'm a grown man and recovered from my shatty accident... xD
I went to fridge to find something to eat while I though how childish I was %%%%ting my pants, from the fridge i got..
Ezreal may have said it looked ravishing on me, but I mean, that face paint should have told me his fashion sense wasn't up to scratch.
I knew I should have trusted Taric to keep me up to date with the latest bikini fashion trends.
They had more recent, more fashionable bikinis on which granted higher stats than my own!
Some of the local mafia members came by, fussed by the horrid smell that was potent throughout the whole town now.
I came out to face them wearing nothing but a sling bikini and my bare fists, but...
